name: export_ts
label: Export TS
description: Exports Timeseries to a set CSV files in a specified directory tree

inputs.name: dsname
inputs.label: DSname
inputs.description: The name of the dataset to export

parameters.name: pattern
parameters.description: pattern used to build the destination tree from metadata (2 more keywords {fid} and {DSname} are available). Example: `{DSname}/{qual_nb_points}/{fid}.csv`
parameters.label: Destination tree pattern

outputs.name: path
outputs.label: Path
outputs.description: The path where the export has been generated
